title: Astra Channel
content: I decided to create a television channel on the concept of astronomy for the general public. lots of history and technology like space, rockets, planets, stars and more that humans haven't gotten to witness. Is a project that combines motion graphics, video editing, animation and graphic design.

title: Starbucks OOH - Game
content: A project that combines the design of a game with the design of an OOH campaign for Starbucks. The game is based on the concept of the campaign, which is to create attention and interest in the public to go to the stores and try the new products. I worked in the logic of the game, dashboard, and arduino

title: H&M - Customer Journey
content: We worked in H&M to improve the customer experience in the store, we did a research and we found that the customers have a lot of problems with the sizes, so we created a new experience for the customers to find the right size for them.

title: Banco W
content: We worked in the new webpage for Banco W, a bank that is focused on the new generations, we created a new experience for the users to find the information that they need, we created a new design for the website and I worke in the front-end development.

title: BITX
content: Bitx is a website that collects information on more than 80+ cryptocurrencies. A website specialized in searching the exchange prices, price change so far and 24h volume.

title: Innlab
content: Design and develop, within a period of 16 weeks, a web artifact that favors customer relationships with the INNLab, in order to improve communication channels with the center, brand exposure and accessibility to the product portfolio and services.
